com.lukeleber.scandroid

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukeleber.scandroid.Globals

  • public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides a means by which to persist Interpreter and Profile instances beyond the bounds of the normal Activity lifecycle. Interpreters maintain state that cannot be persisted through the Serializable or Parcelable interfaces, and as such (at this time, as far as I know) cannot be passed between activities.

    Artifacts are persisted by in-memory static storage for the life of the process. Multiple artifacts may be stored on a per-context basis. This class is internally thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • getInterpreter

        public static Interpreter getInterpreter(android.content.Context key)
        Retrieves the Interpreter for the provided Context
        Parameters:
        key - the calling Context
        Returns:
        the Interpreter for the provided Context or null if there is no Interpreter bound to the provided Context
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the provided Context is null

      • setInterpreter

        public static Interpreter setInterpreter(android.content.Context key,
                         Interpreter interpreter)
        Sets the Interpreter for the provided Context
        Parameters:
        key - the calling Context
        interpreter - the Interpreter to set
        Returns:
        the previously set Interpreter or null if no Interpreter was previously set
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the provided Context is null
